# Interlude IV: The Social Debt {.unnumbered}

> "Love is the belief that the ledger can be balanced. The Maven knows that every handshake is a liability and every promise is a future slight."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

We have dismantled the career. Now, we dismantle the heart. In the chapters that follow, we will explore the mechanics of social sabotage—how to offer support that smothers, and how to disappear into the "Ghosting Protocol."
